title: Pretty Thoughts
description: Pretty Thoughts is the much anticipated collection of poetry and prose following Cindy Cherie's debut release Confessions of Her . Cindy returns with her signature confessional-style storytelling uniquely touching on themes of love, loss, mental health, self-worth and healing.I was born with my heart in my mindand I donâ€™t know any other way of surviving itother than to take all this painand make it look pretty.~ Pretty Thoughts
author: Cindy Cherie
